subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: On the first day, all drivers will go four laps, with the top 33 qualifying. The fastest nine from the first day will vie the next day for the pole position and the first three rows.
snippet: On the first day, all drivers will go four laps, with the top 33 qualifying. The fastest nine from the first day will vie the next day for the pole position and the first three rows.
